page.title: 07EDUCATION AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: A WEE{PRIMARY SCHOOL}CATERS FOR PUPILS FROM THE AGE OF 5 TO 10 YEARS. THERE ARE SEVENTEEN PUPILS SO THERE CAN ONLY BE ONE TEACHER. SHE TRAVELS DAILY FROM HAWICK, 10 MILES AWAY. THE{CURRICULUM FOLLOWED AIMS TO DEVELOP, REINFORCE & EXTEND THE BASIC CONCEPTS OF LANGUAGE & MATHEMATICAL SKILLS, TO ENCOURAGE SELF-AWARENESS WITHIN THE CHILD'S ENVIRONMENT & TO DEVELOP SELF EXPRESSION THROUGH WRITTEN,VERBAL & VISUAL MEANS. THE MAIN LANGUAGE WORK IS BASED ON THE GINN READING SCHEME. THE MATHEMATICAL WORK FOLLOWS THE SCOTTISH PRIMARY MATHEMATICS GROUP SCHEME. ART, CRAFT, DRAMA & MUSIC HELP THE CHILDREN EXPRESS THEMSELVES. THIS WORK CAN BE LINKED TO PROJECTS, TV & RADIO PROGRAMMES, LANGUAGE & MATHS WORK. THE CHILDREN PROGRESS TO PRIMARY 6 IN HAWICK WITH A SOUND EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION.
